channel.title: Need scar to recognize runescape text+another question

item.title: Need scar to recognize runescape text+another question
item.dc:creator: @Dankness Dankness
item.description:
@Dankness wrote:

to split a string into parts, use

[php]
program New;

var I : Integer;
S : String;

begin
S := ‘This is My String’;
for I := 1 to Length ( S ) do
begin
Wait ( 100 + Random ( 100 ));
Writeln( S[I] );
end;
end.

[/php]

Read full topic
